dc:title: Death in August - Vito Marcantonio
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A testament of Vito Marcantonio's political work with the poor. Seen as a Communist sympathizer, he is denied a Church burial. She says he lived Matthew 25 and did the works of mercy. Keywords: obituary
